name: Redman (Redman, Inc.)
description:
Classic platformer with shooting mechanics. Save the forest critters! The main story of the series revolves around the robotic engineer Dr. Thomas Einstein, his robotic kids, Redman (lab assistant), Boll (housekeeper), Kwan (researcher), and their battle against Dr. Albert V. Willie. Redman needs to free the forest creatures while completing levels and avoiding enemies.

Download now for free.
